pr_title: Fix nested query and type conversion in MySQL, remove unused codes

timeline.message: Fix nested query and type conversion in MySQL, remove unused codes

timeline.bodyText:
The codes below returns something like "4010.00" even if the value is a bigint in MySQL, causing Long.parseLong to throw exception

  
    
      skywalking/oap-server/server-storage-plugin/storage-jdbc-hikaricp-plugin/src/main/java/org/apache/skywalking/oap/server/storage/plugin/jdbc/h2/dao/H2AggregationQueryDAO.java
    
    
         Line 82
      in
      0e4e4b8
    
    
    
    

        
          
           topNEntity.setValue(resultSet.getString("value"));
timeline.author: kezhenxu94

timeline.bodyText: MySQL needs an alias in nested query
timeline.author: kezhenxu94

replies.bodyText:
Is alias Working in H2?

yes
replies.author: kezhenxu94

timeline.bodyText: Doesn't agent use this API, right?

replies.bodyText:
